item.title: Sch
item.description: # 学校机房可用软件 |序号|名字|开发者|下载|其他| |---|---|---|---|---| |1|Minecraft（PCL启动器）|龙腾猫跃|夸克云盘：链接直达&蓝奏云：链接直达|bilibili主页链接直达 &链接2的提取码为：pcl2&**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| |2|哔哩哔哩(小破站)|上海宽娱数码科技有限公司|123云盘（自制便携版）：链接直达&官网下载：链接直达|**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| |3|Java（Jdk17）|Microsoft|123云盘：链接直达&备用区：链接直达|**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| |4|隐藏文件小工具|哔哩哔哩-哦额额额的鹅鹅鹅|123云盘：链接直达&备用链接:链接直达|b站主页**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| |5|VMware Workstation|VMware|123云盘：主链接&副链接分卷版-123云主链接&副链接|没有网络服务| # Q&A（Quesation and Answer） ## Q1 为什么夸克云盘下载不了 ### A：夸克云盘限速500KB/S，且需要下载客户端才能下载 ## Q2 为什么部分软件拥有分卷 ### A:123云盘的锅，100MB+的文件需要登陆才能下载😒 ## Q3.各家云盘的优点和缺点（对免费用户） ### A： ### 速度比较（仅展示我们引流的云盘）蓝奏云>123云>夸克 ### 1.蓝奏云 #### 优点：下载不限速，无限空间 #### 缺点：文件最大上传100MB，且文件有扩展名限制 ### 2.123云盘（屠龙者终成恶龙的代表） #### 优点：新人上线送2T超大空间，下载文件最大30MB/S #### 缺点：未登陆只能下载不超过100MB的文件 ### 3.夸克 #### 优点：没有 #### 缺点：一大堆，限速500kb，10GB存储等 。

item.title: 软件下载-直链
item.description:
# 软件在各个系统的支持表格 |APP NAMES| Android SUPPORT|IOS SUPPORT|MAC SUPPORT| LINUX SUPPORT|windows support|Official website| |-----------|---------- |----------------------- |-------------- |---------------------|----------------|----------| |1.QQ| support|support|dmg file or appstore|support x86/64 or arm64 and loong arch and MIPS|QQNT support Windows7及以上的Windows 怀旧版支持XP|im.qq.com| |2.微信|support|support|dmg file or appstore|UOS or wine|support Windows7及以上的Windows|weixin.qq.com| |3.微信输入法|support|support|dmg file|no support|support Windows7及以上的Windows|z.weixin.qq.com| |4.钉钉|support|support|support|support|support Windows7及以上的Windows|dingtalk.com| |5.快手|support|support|Web version|Web version|Web version|kuaishou.com| |6.minecraft(javA)|HMCLPE or FCL|can not on appstore download|HMCL|HMCL|HMCL |PCL|PCL(BILIBILI):https://space.bilibili.com/11343203/dynamic HMCL:https://hmcl.huangyuhui.net| |WSA|no support|no support|no support|no support|支持Windows10 22H2和Windows11所有版本|Not available at the moment| |minecarft-java server|need Termux|no support|need java|need java|need java|https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/download/server| |potplayer|no support|no support|no support|no support|support|potplayer.tv| # 软件下载-直链 ## 1:QQ ## 官网[im.qq.com](im.qq.com) ## **Android** ### *X64* [download](https://downv6.qq.com/qqweb/QQ_1/android_apk/Android_9.0.80_64.apk) ### *X86* [download](https://downv6.qq.com/qqweb/QQ_1/android_apk/Android_8.8.90.7975_537119543_32.apk) ## **windows** ### *X64-QQNT* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Windows/QQ_9.9.12_240715_x64_01.exe) ### *X86-QQNT* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Windows/QQ_9.9.12_240715_x86_01.exe) ### *ARM-QQNT* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Windows/QQ_9.9.12_240715_arm64_01.exe) ### *怀旧版-X86&X64* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/PCQQ9.7.23/QQ9.7.23.29368.exe) ## iphone [get to appstore](https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/qq/id444934666) ## **macos** ### *老版本* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/5333e29d/QQ_v6.9.12-10951.dmg) ### *新版本* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Mac/QQ_6.9.39_240715_01.dmg) ### *APPstore* [get to appstore](https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/qq/id451108668) ## **linux** ### *X86/64* #### *deb* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.10_240715_amd64_01.deb) #### *rpm* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.10_240715_x86_64_01.rpm) #### *app image* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.10_240715_x86_64_01.AppImage) ### *ARM64* #### *DEB* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.10_240715_arm64_01.deb) #### *rpm* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.10_240715_aarch64_01.rpm) #### *appimage* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.10_240715_arm64_01.AppImage) ### *loongArch* #### *deb* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.9_240617_loongarch64_01.deb) ### *MIPS* #### *deb* [download](https://dldir1.qq.com/qqfile/qq/QQNT/Linux/QQ_3.2.9_240617_mips64el_01.deb) ## 2:微信 ## 官网：[weixin.qq.com](weixin.qq.com) ### **Android** #### *X64* [download](https://b7f80f0f694041b19f7d25d3c1948613.dlied1.cdntips.net/dldir1.qq.com/weixin/android/weixin8050android2701_0x2800323e_arm64.apk?mkey=lego_ztc&f=00&sche_type=7&cip=183.7.174.232&proto=https) #### *X86* [download](https://ddce664dc439cb717789fc3dce50a1c2.dlied1.cdntips.net/dldir1.qq.com/weixin/android/weixin8042android2460.apk?mkey=lego_ztc&f=00&sche_type=7&cip=183.7.174.232&proto=https) ### **Windows** #### *X64* [download](https://dldir1v6.qq.com/weixin/Windows/WeChatSetup.exe) #### *X86* [download](https://dldir1v6.qq.com/weixin/Windows/WeChatSetup_x86.exe) ### IOS [download](https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/%E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1/id414478124) ### MAC [download dmg file](https://bf10cb2877bdfba704b5c9f4af87449d.dlied1.cdntips.net/dldir1.qq.com/weixin/mac/WeChatMac.dmg?mkey=lego_ztc&f=00&sche_type=7&cip=183.7.174.232&proto=https) [download to appstore](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/wechat/id836500024?mt=12) ### 微信传输助手网页 [点击前往](https://filehelper.weixin.qq.com) ## 3.微信输入法 #### windows[download](https://download.z.weixin.qq.com/app/win/WeTypeSetup_1.2.1.611_3.exe) #### mac[download](https://download.z.weixin.qq.com/app/mac/1.2.1/WeTypeInstaller_1.2.1_372.zip) #### Iphone[app store download](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/1618175312) #### android[download apk file](https://download.z.weixin.qq.com/app/android/1.3.1/wxkb_806_32.apk) ## 4.钉钉 ### Windows [download](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/win_downloader/dingtalk_downloader.exe) ### mac [10.14.6以上下载这个](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/mac_dmg/Release/M1-Beta/DingTalk_v7.6.3_38842528_universal.dmg) [10.14.6以下下载这个](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/mac_dmg/Release/DingTalk_v7.1.10.17_33370437_x86.dmg) ### android [download](https://wirelesscdn-download.dingtalk.com/wireless/dingtalk/latest/rimet_36180121811227.apk) ### IOS [download](https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/%E9%92%89%E9%92%89/id930368978?l=zh) ### linux-deb #### amd64[download](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/xc_dingtalk_update/linux_deb/Release/com.alibabainc.dingtalk_7.5.20.40705_amd64.deb) #### arm64[download](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/xc_dingtalk_update/linux_deb/Release/com.alibabainc.dingtalk_7.5.20.40605_arm64.deb) #### MIPS[download](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/xc_dingtalk_update/linux_deb/Release/com.alibabainc.dingtalk_7.5.20.40605_mips64el.deb) #### loongarch64[download](https://dtapp-pub.dingtalk.com/dingtalk-desktop/xc_dingtalk_update/linux_deb/Release/com.alibabainc.dingtalk_7.5.20.40605_loongarch64.deb) ## 5.快手 ### IOS [download](apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id440948110?ct=&pt=572643) ### ANDROId [download](https://js.a.kspkg.com/kos/nlav10814/kwai-android-generic-gifmakerrelease-10.10.30.28545_x32_1f14b3.apk) ### web verision [get to](https://kuaishou.com) ## MC(JAVA) ### android [github](https://github.com/HMCL-dev/HMCL-PE/releases) ### PC(windows,linux,mac) [get to github](https://github.com/HMCL-dev/HMCL/releases) ## WSA [download github](https://github.com/lookmeplus/lookmeplus.github.io/releases/download/000/WSA.Msixbundle) [py program install,by github lookmeplus](https://github.com/lookmeplus/lookmeplus.github.io/releases/download/WI1.0/WSAINSTALL.exe) ## minecraft-java server ### ubuntu/debian install code(root user) `sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade && apt install openjdk-17-jdk && mkdir -p /data/minecraftserver && cd /data/minecraftserver && wget -d -o /data/minecraftserver/server.jar 'https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/450698d1863ab5180c25d7c804ef0fe6369dd1ba/server.jar' && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui` ####Next start(need install) `cd /data/minecraftserver && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui` ### windows 1.<font color='red'>你需要至少安装Java17</font> 2.[下载文件](https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/450698d1863ab5180c25d7c804ef0fe6369dd1ba/server.jar) 3.在下载文件夹按住shift和鼠标右键选择**在此处打开命令窗口**或**在此处打开终端** 4.在终端输入`java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.1.21.jar nogui` ### Termux install code `pkg install openjdk-17 -y && mkdir ser && cd ser && wget 'https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/450698d1863ab5180c25d7c804ef0fe6369dd1ba/server.jar' -o server.jar && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui` #### Next Use `cd ser && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui` ## potplayer ### windows #### x86 [download](https://t1.daumcdn.net/potplayer/PotPlayer/Version/Latest/PotPlayerSetup.exe) #### x64 [download](https://t1.daumcdn.net/potplayer/PotPlayer/Version/Latest/PotPlayerSetup64.exe)
。

item.title: 文件分享
item.description: lsposed-zygisk：https://www.123pan.com/s/QfmKVv-5SAhh.html 隐藏应用列表：https://www.123pan.com/s/QfmKVv-qSAhh.html 超级格机（乐视MAX2-root专用）：https://www.123pan.com/s/QfmKVv-g7Ahh.html Windows 8.1ISO链接：https://www.123pan.com/s/QfmKVv-wSvhh.html Windows11 ISO链接：https://www.123pan.com/s/QfmKVv-GSvhh.html 乐视MAX2 lineageos16：https://www.123pan.com/s/QfmKVv-ItAhh.html MC24W10A解压密码：TUJANG：https://github.com/lookmeplus/minecraft/releases/download/24W10A/24W10A.zip。
